blogPost.excerpt: Using Instil, you can teach what you love to students across the globe in a live format. It could be an academic subject, hobby or skill, lifestyle subjects, bootcamps, or anything else.
blogPost.body: Using Instil, you can teach what you love to students across the globe in a live format. It could be an academic subject, hobby or skill, lifestyle subjects, bootcamps, or anything else.
blogPost.title: Instil - Instil helps you create, manage, and monetise live classes.
blogPost.author: Zed A

localize.description: 使用Instil，您可以以直播的形式向全球各地的学生传授您喜爱的知识。它可以是学术科目、爱好或技能、生活方式科目、训练营或其他任何东西。
localize.tagline: Instil帮助你创建、管理和盈利直播课程。

localize.description: 使用Instil，您可以以直播的形式向全球各地的學生傳授您喜愛的知識。它可以是學術科目、愛好或技能、生活方式科目、訓練營或其他任何東西。
localize.tagline: Instil幫助你創建、管理和盈利直播課程。

previous.excerpt: Doppler is a beautifully designed music player designed and built for people who buy music. Import music and playlists to listen offline, and edit song and album artwork and info without syncing. Now with support for Siri, Spotlight Search, and CarPlay.
previous.title: Doppler 2.3 - iOS music player for people who buy music

localize.description: 多普达是一款设计精美的音乐播放器，专为购买音乐的人设计和打造。导入音乐和播放列表进行离线收听，并在不同步的情况下编辑歌曲和专辑封面和信息。现在支持Siri、Spotlight搜索和CarPlay。
localize.tagline: 为购买音乐的人准备的iOS音乐播放器

localize.description: 多普達是一款設計精美的音樂播放器，專爲購買音樂的人設計和打造。導入音樂和播放列表進行離線收聽，並在不同步的情況下編輯歌曲和專輯封面和信息。現在支持Siri、Spotlight搜索和CarPlay。
localize.tagline: 爲購買音樂的人準備的iOS音樂播放器
